question:
Which of the following sentences makes more sense?

OptA: The child hurt their knee because the child started crying.
OptB: The child started crying because the child hurt their knee.

Which of the following sentences makes more sense?

OptA: I washed the car because my car got dirty.
OptB: My car got dirty because i washed the car.

Which of the following sentences makes more sense?

OptA: Someone fainted because someone called 911.
OptB: Someone called 911 because someone fainted.

Which of the following sentences makes more sense?

OptA: The vase shattered on the floor because a man accidently pushed the vase off a counter.
OptB: A man accidently pushed the vase off a counter because the vase shattered on the floor.

Which of the following sentences makes more sense?

OptA: It started raining because the woman who was walking on the street opened her umbrella.
OptB: The woman who was walking on the street opened her umbrella because it started raining.

Which of the following sentences makes more sense?

OptA: The boy lifted his eyes from the book because there was a loud noise.
OptB: There was a loud noise because the boy lifted his eyes from the book.

Which of the following sentences makes more sense?

OptA: The girl had a nightmare because the girl woke up covered in cold sweat.
OptB: The girl woke up covered in cold sweat because the girl had a nightmare.

OptB: It started raining because the driver turned the wipers on.

OptB: A man was covered in sticky red goo because a watermelon exploded.

OptB: She noticed that she was out of toilet paper because she went to the store and bought toilet paper.

OptB: The dinosaurs became extinct because a large object hit the Earth.

OptB: The bottle was left open because the soda went flat.

OptB: George plugged the laptop charger in because the laptop ran out of battery.

OptA: Sunlight filled the room because the curtains were opened.
OptB: The curtains were opened because sunlight filled the room.

OptB: Tomatoes grew on the vine because the insect pollinated the tomato flowers.

OptB: The man couldn't hear what the woman was saying because the man turned down the music volume.

OptB: The meat spoiled because the power was out for days.

OptB: The gardener planted a seed because a flower grew.

OptB: There was a snowstorm because school was cancelled.

OptB: The tenants contacted their landlord because the tenants noticed mold on the bathroom ceiling.
